personalData.title: [1] About personal data collections.
personalData.content: In the event of abuse, misuse, or other activities that adversely affect the operation or integrity of the service, automated systems may process limited technical information, including but not limited to Internet Protocol (IP) addresses and Autonomous System Numbers (ASN), solely for the purpose of detecting, preventing, and mitigating such activities. Such information is processed transiently and is not retained beyond what is necessary for immediate analysis. I reserve the right to impose access restrictions or to block access, in whole or in part, based on the outcome of such processing.
